reviewText: What fun these movies are! It was wonderful to get all 3 on seperate disc's in the same box. Chevy Chase and the whole gang make these a must see collection. You won't be disappointed. All you need is to buy Christmas Vacation then you will have the complete set. The price of the collection is very reasonable.
